actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 by establishing a Legislative Classification System within the Congressional Budget Office.

summary.text: Establishes a legislative classification system, pursuant to the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974, within the Congressional Budget Office to supply the information needs of the Congress by cross-referencing the pertinent data with respect to Federal programs and expenditures. Abolishes the Legislative Classification Office of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 by establishing a Legislative Classification System within the Congressional Budget Office.
